channel.title: go on In Search of Lost Time
channel.description: Recent content in go on In Search of Lost Time

item.title: Would cluster-autoscaler consider my soft constraints?
item.description: Is there a way to identify if cluster-autoscaler would consider scheduling constraints you have set?

item.title: Understanding client-go listers and reflectors in the context of cluster-autoscaler
item.description: What are listers and reflectors in client-go? I am going to talk about the above problem in the context of cluster-autoscaler.

item.title: How to fetch an element by class or id using go's `html` package
item.description: Supplements the official docs around html package with gotchas
